title: Meeting Action Items
description: Action items extracted strictly from a meeting transcript (notes used only if transcript is unavailable)

meeting_date.description: Meeting date in YYYY-MM-DD format, or 'UNKNOWN' if not stated in the transcript

participants.description: Participants ordered by speaking frequency based ONLY on transcript dialogue

speaking_count.description: Approximate number of speaking turns in the transcript

action_items.description: Explicitly stated action items from the transcript

description.description: Exact or closely paraphrased commitment from the transcript

mentioned_in_context.description: Timestamp or dialogue context where the action item appears
